name: CHESSU
description:
Chessu - Chess without limits!

Chess is limiting, only letting you place pieces on a grid! Not only that, but chess pieces can't go off the board! Now that's what you call boring! In CHESSU, pieces arent limited at all! Throw pieces around and try to knock the king off the arena!

CLASSIC MODE

Chess is boring, but I still want to respect the rules! In CLASSIC MODE, players take turns to move! Strategize ricochets! Form positions! (or get wiped out by a single bishop who got lucky, that happens too!)

TURNLESS MODE

Who needs rules? This mode is the definition of chaos! Move whenever you want! Do whatever you want! Throw your rook off the map! Create a stack of pawns! Go rob a bank! (Don't actually do that)

CHESSU AI

Our DANGEROUSLY - ADMIRABLE - VERY - INTELLIGENT - SUPERCOMPUTER (DAVIS for short) will play chessu with you! For those times when you don't have friends!
